raw_body: BINDUHEWA – MERCY (nee Geeganage). Beloved wife of late Sarath N C De S Binduhewa,​ loving mother of Deepthi Jayasekar & Madhuri Fernando,​ mother-in-law of Jayasekar Jayaraman & Duleep Fernando,​ sister of Geetha Samarajiva,​ grandmother of Jeeth,​ Vinu,​ Veronica & Natasha. Remains lie at Jayaratne Restpect Home. Cortege leaves residence on Wednesday,​ 10th January 2024 at 4.00 p.m. for cremation at 4.30 p.m. General Cemetery Borella (New Crematorium).002520
